alert.note: Alert for Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Southern Erie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 26 at 2:28PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...AN AREA OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF CHAUTAUQUA... CATTARAUGUS...AND SOUTHERN ERIE COUNTIES... HAZARDS...An area of heavy snow which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. This area of heavy snow is producing extremely heavy snow at the rate of up to 1 inch per hour. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 227 PM EST, an area of heavy snow was centered from Fredonia to Forestville and moving northeast at 10 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Dunkirk, Fredonia, Evans, Silver Creek, Angola, North Collins, Lake Erie State Park, Evangola State Park, Angola on the Lake, SUNY Fredonia, Sheridan, Stockton, Brocton, Arkwright, Forestville, Cassadaga, Perrysburg, Farnham, Silver Creek Reservoir and Versailles. This includes Interstate 90 between exits 59 and 58. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this area of heavy snow. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
